#summary Detail on addItemAuction()

Call this function to add a new auction item on Delcampe website.


== Details ==

 * syntax : addItemAuction(string $token, $arrData)

 * parameter 1 : _string_ : secret token
 * parameter 2 : _array_  : containing the data needed to create an auction item

 * return : _array_ : first element is the status (boolean) and second one is additional data


== Code example (PHP) ==
{{{
// MANDATORY
$data['id_country']      = 0;
$data['id_site']         = 1;
$data['id_category']     = 80;
$data['price_starting']  = rand(10, 15) . '.00';
$data['price_increment'] = '0.' . rand(10, 99);
$data['currency']        = 'EUR';
$data['title']           = 'FFF Testing item . ' . date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
}}}
